name: Vessel Recruit
description: You are a military recruit tasked to perform an alpha field test on the bio-organic power armor - the flesh vessel - installed with necessary bionics. After the Cataclysm struck, your connection with the team was lost, and worst, feeding the suit would be a major problem.

name: Pathogenic Experimental
description: You, a hapless lab rat, were chosen to wear an extremely unstable bio-organic power armor - the flesh vessel "Pathogen" - for testing purposes. Although the team may have granted you access to the outside world, your exact movements were monitored. But now that everything has fallen into chaos, you can either free yourself from the suit, or become one with it...
